data.title: Eastend Tattoos
data.meta_description: Discover artistic mastery and timeless tradition at Raul Arevelo Eastend Tattoos in Austin. Immerse yourself in a world of captivating designs, inspired by Raul's global journey as a tattoo artist. Embrace the charm of an old-school sailor tattoo shop, where classic meets contemporary in every stroke. Visit us at our new location in Austin, TX, and experience the artistry that defines Eastend Tattoos
data.text:
Raul Arevalo

Step into the world of art and craftsmanship at Eastend Tattoos, the jewel of Austin’s tattooing scene since the mid 90’s. Owned and operated by the talented artist Raul Arevalo, our studio is nestled on 6th Street, right next to the the Lucky Duck and Lichees Cantina, in the heart of East Austin. Prepare to be captivated by our unique blend of creativity, tradition, and passion for the art of tattooing.

A Journey of Artistry and Adventure

With a remarkable career that has seen him establish successful tattoo shops in Denmark, South Padre Island as well as owning a revered studio in Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca, Mexico for over 20 years, Raul Arevalo brings a world of experience to Eastend Tattoos. Drawing inspiration from his travels and collaborations worldwide, Raul’s artistry reflects a deep respect for the roots of tattoo culture while incorporating his distinct and contemporary style.

Rediscover the Old School Sailor Tattoo Shop

At Eastend Tattoos, we take pride in rekindling the spirit of the old-school sailor tattoo shop. Raul Arevalo’s vision is to create an authentic experience where the timeless charm of traditional tattooing meets the innovation and skill of a true artist. The studio’s ambiance is adorned with awe-inspiring paintings of majestic ships and legendary Old Men of the Sea, collected from Raul’s travels and masterfully created by him. As you step inside, you’ll find yourself surrounded by Bert Grim and Tom Berg’s iconic flash designs, tastefully placed among taxidermy and antiques, all echoing the rich heritage of tattoo art.
